scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:worker
scripts.build:worker: cd apps/worker && (npm run build 2>&1 || echo 'Worker build skipped (no build script)')
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/web && npm install && cd ../worker && npm install
scripts.db:generate: docker compose exec web npx prisma generate
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec web npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.db:deploy: docker compose exec web npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec web npm run prisma:seed
scripts.db:studio: docker compose exec web npx prisma studio
